Question: Shenzhen Sugr Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sugr Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Sugr Sense

- All-in-one IoT Voice Solutions
- AI Voice Algorithms
- Cloud Services
- Production
- Software
- Hardware
- UX & UI Design
- Supports more than 15 languages
- Over 60 solutions including Smart Home, Automobile, Mobility, and conference
- Full-stack voice solutions including Microphone Algorithms, Voice Services, Hardware, Firmware, App, Cloud, and more
- Industry leading Noise Reduction DSP module

Sugr Technology Co., Ltd

产品：Sugr Sense

- 多功能物联网语音解决方案
- AI 语音算法
- 云服务
